extendedInfo.description: â Put your face into the classics! ââ #1 Photo app in the UK! â 200 classic paintings to put your face in! 16 paintings for free or unlock all of them for 99Â¢Just take a pic or choose one from your library and insert your face or your friend's into some classic art!Then share it via Facebook, Twitter, E-mail, or SMS!Fun for hours, or at least 10s of minutes!And now it's even more fun with the goodies pack! 81 great things to put on top of your pictures!And a caption tool so you can write on your pictures! And frames to put your pictures in!Download it now!And if you like it please come back and give it a review.â Includes these packs, they come with a bunch of free stuff, or buy more for a low price!1. The Masterpieces! 112 Classic paintings to stick your face in!2. Goodies pack! 81 great images to stick on your picture!3. Caption tool! Write stuff on your pictures!4. Frames pack! Put your finished picture in one of over 30 great frames!ââ Quick Instructions âââ Download it, then open it!â Click a paintingâ Then either take a photo or choose one from your photo album.â Use Multi-touch to move and resize your photo until your face fits in the space! ( Click "Flip" if you wanna flip the pic )â Click "Color" to adjust the colors of your image to make it match the painting!â When your done click on the goodies tab to add fun stuff to your pic!â Then click frames to add a classic frame to your picture!â Or at any time click the share button in the bottom right and.. â Then you can save it, put it on facebook, twitter, or copy it to send your pic in an SMS!If you're tired of playing Draw Something all the time, take a break and make yourself a masterpiece!Put your face in a Picasso, Da-avinci, or show us the Monet!Replace a face of a Masterpiece!
